SELECT ws.score_id,ws.score_year,ws.score_all,ws.score_english,ws.score_politics,ws.score_math, ws.score_major,wm.major_name,wm.major_code,wm.major_type,wd.department_name,wsc.school_name from wx_score as ws inner JOIN wx_mcd as wmc on ws.connect_id=wmc.connect_id INNER JOIN wx_major as wm on wm.major_id=wmc.major_id INNER JOIN wx_department as wd on wd.department_id=wmc.department_id INNER JOIN wx_school as wsc on wsc.school_id=wd.department_school_id
and ws.score_year = #{scoreYear} and #{scoreAll}>=ws.score_all and #{scoreMath}>=ws.score_math and #{scoreEnglish}>=ws.score_english and #{scorePolitics}>=ws.score_politics and #{scoreMajor}>=ws.score_major and ws.score_major_id = #{scoreMajorId} and wm.major_name like concat('%', #{majorName}, '%') and wm.major_type = #{majorType} and wm.major_code = #{majorCode} and wd.department_name like concat('%', #{departmentName}, '%') and wsc.school_name like concat('%', #{schoolName}, '%')
